title: problem displaying files with umlauts
body:
### expected behaviour
existing files with umlauts are  not shown.
### actual behaviour
only when hitting ctrl+r the files show up. instead of the umlaut there is a "?" sign. upon clicking on the file, owncloud redirects to the login screen with the error "cloud not found"
uploading a new file with umlaut like mã¼ll.txt works fine but i canâ´ t edit this file with the inline editor. the file gets downloaded

### steps to reproduce
1. update do rc4 with a existing file with umlauts
2. try to access the folder with that file and  hit ctrl+r
3. try to klick on that file

### server configuration
operating system: centos 6.5

web server: apache 2.2.3

database: mysql 5

php version: 5.3.8

default_charset = "utf-8" 

owncloud version: 6rc4

### client configuration
browser: ff

operating system: linux

### logs
#### web server error log
```
[sun dec 08 16:09:43 2013] [error] [client 78.51.140.243] php warning:  json_encode(): invalid utf-8 sequence in argument in /home/www/htdocs/www.example.de/lib/private/json.php on line 113, referer: https://example.de/index.php/apps/files?dir=/privat/secure/firefox
```

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
none
```
